title: Sustainable Nursing Education Program Utilizing Collaborative Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice knowledge and foundational understanding of sustainability
context.additional_context: A long-term mobile-based course for practicing nurses. Applies a blended education approach combining BYOD-based collaborative simulations and self-directed learning

learning_goals: Learners can perform medical waste segregation procedures with 90% accuracy according to sustainable resource management principles
Learners can participate at least 80% in planning and executing sustainable nursing interventions through simulation-based collaborative activities
Maintain a score of 75 or above (out of 100) on sustainable nursing knowledge assessments in a 6-month follow-up evaluation after course completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
